div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Outcome
Increase the number of
credit card releases

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Opportunity
leverage the
Member Get Member (MGM) program

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Opportunity
consider MGM in the
limit increase decision
for a reward->action pattern

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Opportunity
fairly estimate the contribution
to Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)
given the MGM behavior

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Opportunity
give limit increases more
frequently so it
follows MGM's dynamic behavior
and creates more happy moments

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Hypothesis
there is elasticity in
MGM behavior after a
limit increase

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Hypothesis
MGM value is considerable
when compared to other
components of the CLT
to define a limit increase

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Solution
incorporate a delta MGM
by delta limit increase
by customer segment in
the limit increase decision

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Solution
build a model for customer level
MGM-limit increase
elasticity and use it
for limit increase decision

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Hypothesis
the current decision framework
accepts a segment
estimation of MGM-limit increase
elasticity to estimate the CLT
